mapper.select: select ifnull(G.dateGap, '') dateGap, P.idx, P.userId, P.postDateTime, DATE_FORMAT(P.tripDateTime, "%Y-%c-%e %l:%i %p") tripDateTime, P.photo, P.content, P.location, P.locale, P.lat, P.lot, P.tourIdx, C.transport category, P.price, P.score, P.favorite from TB_CATEGORY C, TB_POST P left join (select D.dateGap, min(P.idx) idx from TB_POST P right join (select DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(P.tripDateTime, '%Y-%m-%d'), T.startDate)+1 dateGap, min(P.tripDateTime) tripDateTime from TB_POST P left join TB_TOUR T on P.tourIdx = T.idx where P.userId = #{userId} and P.tourIdx = #{tourIdx} group by dateGap) D on D.tripDateTime = P.tripDateTime group by D.tripDateTime) G on P.idx = G.idx where P.userId = #{userId} and P.tourIdx = #{tourIdx} and P.category = C.transport_id order by P.tripDateTime asc, P.postDateTime asc, P.idx asc
